verses.verse: <S%H559>Say<s%> you to your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H5971>Ammi;<s%> and to your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H7355>Ruhamah.<s%>

<S%H7378>Plead<s%> with your <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H7378>plead:<s%> for she is not my <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> am I her <S%H376>husband:<s%> let her therefore <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H2183>prostitutions<s%> out of her <S%H6440>sight,<s%> and her <S%H5005>adulteries<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> her <S%H7699>breasts;<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> I <S%H6584>strip<s%> her <S%H6174>naked,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> her as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that she was <S%H3205>born,<s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> her as a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H7896>set<s%> her like a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4191>slay<s%> her with <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
And I will not have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on her <S%H1121>children;<s%> for they be the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2183>prostitutions.<s%>

For their <S%H517>mother<s%> has played the <S%H2181>harlot:<s%> she that <S%H2029>conceived<s%> them has done <S%H3001>shamefully:<s%> for she <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H157>lovers,<s%> that <S%H5414>give<s%> me my <S%H3899>bread<s%> and my <S%H4325>water,<s%> my <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax,<s%> my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H8250>drink.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7753>hedge<s%> up your <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H5518>thorns,<s%> and <S%H1443>make<s%> a <S%H1447>wall,<s%> that she shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> her <S%H5410>paths.<s%>

And she shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> after her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> but she shall not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them; and she shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> them, but shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> them: then shall she <S%H559>say,<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H376>husband;<s%> for <S%H227>then<s%> was it <S%H2896>better<s%> with me than <S%H6258>now.<s%>

For she did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> her <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> will I <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> away my <S%H1715>corn<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> thereof, and my <S%H8492>wine<s%> in the <S%H4150>season<s%> thereof, and will <S%H5337>recover<s%> my <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax<s%> given to <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H1540>discover<s%> her <S%H5040>lewdness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> her out of my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

I will also cause <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4885>mirth<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> her <S%H2282>feast<s%> days, her <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and her <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H4150>feasts.<s%>

And I will <S%H8074>destroy<s%> her <S%H1612>vines<s%> and her <S%H8384>fig<s%> trees, <S%H834>whereof<s%> she has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1992>These<s%> are my <S%H866>rewards<s%> that my <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> me: and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them a <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them.

And I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> on her the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1168>Baalim,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> she <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to them, and she <S%H5710>decked<s%> herself with her <S%H5141>earrings<s%> and her <S%H2484>jewels,<s%> and she <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgot<s%> me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6601>allure<s%> her, and <S%H1980>bring<s%> her into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5921>comfortably<s%> <S%H3820><s%> to her.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her her <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> for a <S%H6607>door<s%> of <S%H8615>hope:<s%> and she shall <S%H6030>sing<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> and as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it shall be at that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> me <S%H376>Ishi;<s%> and shall <S%H7121>call<s%> me <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1180>Baali.<s%>

For I will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> out of her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> by their <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for them with the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>and with the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and with the <S%H7431>creeping<s%> things of the <S%H127>ground:<s%> and I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and will make them to <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H983>safely.<s%>

And I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to me for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> yes, I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to me in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and in loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and in <S%H7356>mercies.<s%>
I will even <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to me in <S%H530>faithfulness:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> I will <S%H6030>hear,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H6030>hear<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and they shall <S%H6030>hear<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
And the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H6030>hear<s%> the <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and the <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil;<s%> and they shall <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

And I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> her to me in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and I will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on her that had not <S%H5375>obtained<s%> <S%H7355>mercy;<s%> and I will <S%H559>say<s%> to them which were not my <S%H5971>people,<s%> You are my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> You are my <S%H430>God.<s%>
